name: Free eBook Finder
special_instructions: The 'search' filter is optional. If not provided, the tool will return a general list of ebooks.
The 'language' filter is optional. If not provided, the tool will return ebooks in all languages.
The 'startUrls' filter is optional. If not provided, the tool will start from the main Gutenberg.org page.
The 'maxItems' filter is optional. If not provided, the tool will return all available ebooks.
The 'extendOutputFunction' option is a function that takes a JQuery handle ($) as argument and returns data that will be merged with the default output.
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
